summary: Small, simple changes to make interiors more distinct and recognizable.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://imgur.com/G0Jp4s5.png[/img][size=3]
[center]Special Edition version is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6130?]here[/url].[/center][center]Thank you to kelsenellenelvian for porting this to Oldrim and maintaining it![/center]
This is my own flavor of diversifying some of Skyrim's interiors. I've been working on this on and off for months during my four seconds of free time each week, but I decided to go ahead and publish what I have so far as a work-in-progress. I will be updating as time permits. 
My goal is for these edited interiors to feel distinct and purposeful, but to avoid massive overhauls. The changes are small and often limited to decoration - the layout of each interior remains relatively the same. It should still feel very much like Skyrim, just with the added perk of being able to visually assess what sort of place you're in. The Temple of Mara is lavish and warm, general goods stores actually have general goods, and inns are unique to their region/name.
Modders resources have been used very sparingly, and there should be nothing jarring or immersion-breaking.

[center][/center][center][youtube]w8u2rmlHpes[/youtube] [youtube]hJFbMDy1Bjc[/youtube][/center][/size][u][u]
[/u][/u][img]http://imgur.com/qefIAPr.png[/img]
[size=3][b]ELFX Highly Recommended[/b] - I designed these interiors while using ELFX. In general, I have tried to avoid moving existing lights for maximum compatibility. You can use with or without ELFX, but...use ELFX. 
[b]Purple Honey Pots?[/b] - Some people have issues with the honey pot texture being purple. I'm not sure why this is, I've triple checked that I'm using the default path, but it can be resolved by downloading [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3036/?]this[/url].
[/size]
[img]http://imgur.com/rm6IuPG.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2414/?]Snazzy Furniture and Clutter[/url] - [color=#ff0000][b][u]Not compatible.[/u][/b][/color] Both modifying interior decor. Will be clipping.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/173/?]Immersive Citizens - AI Overhaul[/url] - [color=#6aa84f][b][u]Compatible AFAIK![/u][/b][/color] I have not deleted any furniture or changed layouts. I use both without a problem.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2506/?]Friendlier Taverns[/url] - [color=#ff0000][b][u]Not compatible.[/u][/b][/color] Both modifying interior decor. Will be clipping.
author: Sokkvabekk
